content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the curve <math alttext="4 times y squared, plus x y, minus 2 times x squared, equals 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates negative 1 comma negative 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
